## Script Info

**Project:** OECD National Evaluation Portal\
**Purpose:** (1) To explore 2023 Survey Responses on central web portal, (2) to present findings in the portal assessment table.



## Input Data Sets


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
survey_2023.csv
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
portals_information.csv
```


:::
:::




\newpage

## 2023 Survey Data Exploration


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


Table: Unique Values per Column

|Column                   |Unique_Values                                      | Count|
|:------------------------|:--------------------------------------------------|-----:|
|STRUCTURE                |DATAFLOW                                           |     1|
|STRUCTURE_ID             |OECD.GOV.GIP:DSD_QDD_GOV_PE@DF_GOV_PE(1.0)         |     1|
|STRUCTURE_NAME           |Public policy evaluation - 2023                    |     1|
|ACTION                   |I                                                  |     1|
|REF_AREA                 |LUX, DNK, BEL, SWE, GRC, ISL, CZE, LVA, POL, IR... |    31|
|Reference area           |Luxembourg, Denmark, Belgium, Sweden, Greece, I... |    31|
|FREQ                     |A                                                  |     1|
|Frequency of observation |Annual                                             |     1|
|MEASURE                  |Q_MC_INTROOBJ-IMPAC, Q_MC_RESPOMOF, Q_MC_RESPOP... |   412|
|Measure                  |Improve accountability and transparency of deci... |   312|
|TIME_PERIOD              |2023                                               |     1|
|Time period              |                                                   |     1|
|OBS_VALUE                |1, No, Yes, for some laws (<50%), Budget Proces... |   731|
|Observation value        |                                                   |     1|
|OBS_STATUS               |A                                                  |     1|
|Observation status       |Normal value                                       |     1|
|UNIT_MULT                |0                                                  |     1|
|Unit multiplier          |Units                                              |     1|


:::
:::

Only keep relevant columns for 2023 survey

|Column          |Unique_Values                                      | Count|
|:---------------|:--------------------------------------------------|-----:|
|country         |Luxembourg, Denmark, Belgium, Sweden, Greece, I... |    31|
|survey_question |Improve accountability and transparency of deci... |   312|
|survey_answer   |1, No, Yes, for some laws (<50%), Budget Proces... |   731|
